articles.title: Argentina Hikes Interest Rate 300 Basis Points as Inflation Spirals
articles.description: The central bank upped the benchmark Leliq rate by 300 basis points to 52%, the sharpest rise since 2019, citing rising perception of financial risk, soaring global prices and the need to spur saving in the hard-hit local peso currency.
